page.description: Fires when the user right clicks a row in the List control.

discussion.p: The *[js:onRightClick]* event is triggered when the user right clicks on a row in the List. Your code can reference *[js:arguments[0]]*, a zero based index of the row that was right clicked. In addition the Javascript can reference the 'this' scope, which is a pointer to the List object. For example, to set focus to the row the user clicked on:

page.example: // Set the focus to the clicked row: this.setValue(arguments[0]);
